TopicTitle: How to add descriptions to craft?

Articles.Content: I see that the stock craft have descriptions in 0.21, but how do I add descriptions to my own craft?

Click on the "Name" thingie, and a description box drops down.

Click on it and start typing.
Yeah, when you click to change your ship name, you'll have the little box with the name to change, and a larger blank box underneath. The big box is the description.

Click the ship name box and type your description in the
